# Input.RatingIcons

#### Introduced in version 1.3

| Property | Type | Required | Description | Version |
| -------- | ---- | -------- | ----------- | ------- |
| **selected** | `Element` | No | The element to display for selected stars (the current selected value and any values before that). | 1.3 |
| **unselected** | `Element` | No | The element to display for unselected stars (any values after the currently selected value). | 1.3 |


## selected

The element to display for selected stars (the current selected value and any values before that).

* **Type**: `Element`
* **Required**: No
* **Allowed values**:
  * `ActionSet`
  * `ColumnSet`
  * `Container`
  * `FactSet`
  * `Image`
  * `ImageSet`
  * `Input.ChoiceSet`
  * `Input.Date`
  * `Input.Number`
  * `Input.Rating`
  * `Input.Text`
  * `Input.Time`
  * `Input.Toggle`
  * `Media`
  * `RichTextBlock`
  * `TextBlock`


## unselected

The element to display for unselected stars (any values after the currently selected value).

* **Type**: `Element`
* **Required**: No
* **Allowed values**:
  * `ActionSet`
  * `ColumnSet`
  * `Container`
  * `FactSet`
  * `Image`
  * `ImageSet`
  * `Input.ChoiceSet`
  * `Input.Date`
  * `Input.Number`
  * `Input.Rating`
  * `Input.Text`
  * `Input.Time`
  * `Input.Toggle`
  * `Media`
  * `RichTextBlock`
  * `TextBlock`
